__e: Oh, and the next time you jump into bed with a politician, I'd advise you to learn more about his associates.
Either you are going to listen to me, or in precisely four seconds... which is the time it will take me to walk through that door... you will be left without an ally in the English-speaking world.
Shall I interrogate Lu Jianxing? I'll make sure he gives up the others.
In war, you need to be able to coerce your allies every bit as much as your enemies.
But that's not enough to say we are friends or allies.
I appreciate you helping me rescue the wolves, but if there is any chance of making Finn an ally, you should take it.
